A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Fantastic! I’m a HUGE Star Wars saga fan and I think this was a perfect addition to the saga...original\, but still a Star Wars movie...the plot was INCREDIBLE and the writing was super witty. I enjoyed that it wasn’t just like the first or second trilogy\, and this new trilogy seems to be adding and developing the Star Wars universe in a way that was totally unpredicted. Definitely recommend seeing this.
